ygData.subject: RE: Black Silk Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: No.  In fact, I think there are about 5 or 6 MOBs in MM that are capable of dropping Black Silk Gloves - not just the ushers. Desmei Sightblinder Lvl 32 Bard
ygData.messageBody:
No. In fact, I think there are about 5 or 6 MOBs in MM that are capable of
dropping Black Silk Gloves - not just the ushers.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 32 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Eric Boller [mailto:eboller@...]
> Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 11:48 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Black Silk Gloves
>
>
> From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>
>
> A friend of mine said he got Black silk gloves off
> willsappers--not Deathly Ushers. Is this a mistake in
> the lambent gauntlet quest?
>
> Thex
>
